event.title: was officially recognized by the Council of the League of Nations in 1922

data.event: After the Partitioning of the Ottoman Empire after World War I by Britain and France, the Emirate of Transjordan was officially recognized by the Council of the League of Nations in 1922.
In 1946, Jordan became an independent sovereign state officially known as The Hashemite Kingdom of Transjordan.

event.title: captured the West Bank during the 1948

data.event: Jordan captured the West Bank during the 1948 Arab–Israeli War and the name of the state was changed to The Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan on 1 December 1948.

event.title: was changed to The Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan on 1 December 1948

data.event: Jordan captured the West Bank during the 1948 Arab–Israeli War and the name of the state was changed to The Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan on 1 December 1948.
